Description:
SUPERB VALUE IN KENNINGTON
A rare opportunity to purchase in this much sought after position in a very affordable price range.
This two bedroom brick veneer unit would make an excellent investment, offering an open plan kitchen/meals/living space and off street undercover car parking.
Owner occupiers looking to downsize or enter the market would also find this practical residence well worth consideration.

Description:
SUPERB PRESENTATION - IDEAL INVESTMENT
Situated in popular Yallambee Drive, Strathdale is an immaculate two bedroom (both with BIR's) unit ideal for the owner occupier or investor. This is a lovely updated unit with only five on the block. Spacious open plan living with gas heating and ceiling fan. The kitchen has breakfast bar and stainless appliances. Low maintenance living inside and out.
An ideal opportunity for an investor, first home buyer or retirees to purchase. Currently leased until July 2015 @ $220 per week to a great tenant.

Description:
Prime Investment Location
Situated in one of Bendigo's most sought after Investment locations being close to the University, Strath Hill shopping centre, the new Woolworths Supermarket, Secondary schools and many other facilities. The property includes solid brick and weatherboard residence currently let at $240pw with procession available early December 2014. The allotment is approx. 813sqm with a good frontage and excellent re-development opportunities, subject to council approval. The house offers room for renovation making a versatile investment opportunity.

Description:
AS NEW PRESENTATION & DECEPTIVELY SPACIOUS
Situated within 10 mins walk to Bendigo's CBD in popular Kennington is this immaculate two bedroom unit that has recently been refurbished.
An inspection is a must to truly appreciate how this residence outclasses much of its competition in the market today.
Offering 9ft ceilings, spacious open plan kitchen/meals and living space, two large bedrooms with built in robes and a relaxing outdoor alfresco area.
Also features a small private front yard for those wanting a garden, and an extra large garage that provides access to an additional undercover space - perfect for storage, bikes or barbecues.
Set privately away from the road in an ultra-quiet position.
A great choice for astute investors but sure impress owner occupiers equally.
Darryn O'Keefe : 0418 509 563

Description:
Size? Tick! Location? Tick!
It's big and fantastic! Situated in a prestigious Kennington location a short walk to the Strathdale shopping precinct, St.Thereses Primary school, Bendigo East secondary school and Latrobe University. Ideally suited to a family with it's spacious and open floor plan it features a large lounge-room with formal dining area, an open plan kitchen/meals and family room with plenty of light, four bedrooms including a main bedroom with walk in robe and ensuite, family bathroom, laundry and plenty of cupboard space throughout the home. There is ducted gas heating, ducted vacuum system and wall air-conditioning. Situated on a huge 1400m2 allotment. This is great value for money in hard to beat location, a great family home or investment property.

Description:
GREAT VALUE IN AN EXCEPTIONAL LOCATION
Situated in a highly sought after position within walking distance to Bendigo and also La Trobe University, is this brick veneer residence.
Set on a spacious 692sqm allotment, the residence comprises three bedrooms with built in robes, open plan kitchen/meals plus a spacious separate lounge room which also adjoins a formal dining space.
Modern conveniences include dishwasher, split system reverse cycle air conditioning and a gas heater.
External attributes include a single carport with adjoining brick shed/workshop with power and concrete floor.
A very affordable property which would make an excellent addition to any investment portfolio or a great place to live for owner occupiers.

Description:
Boutique at its best!!
This stunning custom home was built by local boutique builder Reuben Beazley and the quality of the workmanship shines throughout. Having been a display home it has all the features that you would expect and more. From the feature stone and timber entry and 9ft ceilings, to the glass enclosed conservatory with views of the walking track, this house feels like a home.
The kitchen is a gourmet's delight, featuring high quality European appliances, Granite benchtops and a walk in pantry. With 4 living areas and 3 bedrooms, it's a house for the family. Currently used as a 4 bedroom, this home has the flexibility to comfortably have 5 bedrooms and still maintain 3 living areas. The loft has the option to be used as a living area for the kids or another bedroom and the study has a large storeroom/wardrobe with built in desks. With double glazing and smart glass, as well as upgraded insulation this home is built for warmth and privacy.
The yard comprises of a beautiful Indian slate paved area with a 6x3 powered colourbond shed and drive through access.
The kid's will delight in the easy access to the park across the creek and you can sit back in the conservatory and watch them play. The smart glass provides privacy reflecting a mirror image back to walkers on the path, but allowing you clear views of the park and bushland.
Located in the heart of Kennington, close to schools, shops and the lake, what more could you ask for?
Kerin Friswell : 0477 277 600

Description:
Great House with Views in Kennington
This 3 bedroom brick veneer family home enjoys an elevated position in a quiet street on a 1000 square metre allotment with the added bonus of an inground swimming pool. A light and bright formal living and dining room with polished floor boards and views of the cathedral leads through to the well appointed fully renovated kitchen and there's the added bonus of a family room with open fire place which opens onto the outdoor living areas. All 3 bedrooms have B.I.R's and there is an Ensuite, 3 piece family bathroom and laundry. Outside a carport and garden shed. This is one not to be missed â?? it has so much on offer. Great position with so much potential.

Description:
As rare as hens teeth
Situated in the heart of Kennington and surrounded by quality homes and amenities this 306m2 block is the smart option for those looking to build amongst established homes in one of Bendigo's top locations (Subject to council approval).
With a total street frontage of 16.71m (RHS easement of 3.7m) and depth of 18.29m, this fully fenced, flat block with all services available excludes restrictive covenants allowing your imagination and design skills to run wild. Walk to Kennington Reservoir, Strath Hill and Strath Village shopping precincts, St Therese's Primary School, Kennington Primary School. The University, Bendigo South East Secondary College,
childcare facilities,
and an array of other practical amenities

Description:
Develop, Detonate, or Renovate
Perfectly positioned in a classic location is this modest home either looking for someone to give it a major facelift and renovation, or demolish it and develop into a multiple townhouse site (STCA). The interior is all original and offers 3 bedrooms, kitchen and dining area, separate lounge room, bathroom, laundry and toilet.
Also a bonus of ducted heating and wall mounted air conditioning. Sited on an approx. 610m2 block, this property is within walking distance to school, La Trobe uni, buses, shopping centres and the best recreational facilities around town.
This is one to have a really good look at for long term benefits.

Description:
Classic California Bungalow in Perfect Location
This three bedroom classic weatherboard California Bungalow would be perfect for you to renovate to your liking & tastes. A comfortable lounge, open kitchen meals, compact main bathroom all in original order throughout, you could move in to renovate as you go or possibly develop the site and extend on to the home, all subject to council approval. In an ideal location with in walking distance to Bendigo, schools, shops, recreation facilities, and so much more the convenience will surprise you. The home is situated on a good-sized allotment offering the astute buyer flexibility with their choices on how best to capitalise on this rare opportunity. Rarely offered to the market so be quick to act on this property.

Description:
CHARMING HOME!
Ever wanted to live in a house behind a white picket fence? After looking through this, I do! This delightful character filled home enjoys a location where the lifestyle attractions are aplenty. Central inner city living! Close to schools, University, Town centre & Lake Weeroona. From the front porch, entrance greets you with bamboo flooring,
three bedrooms, extremely high ceilings & classic Victorian features. Renovated in 2007, the hard work has well and truly been completed, with the ability to still place your own stamp on this gem! The family bathroom is rustic & sizeable. The sun filled open plan lounge / dining / kitchen, complete with access to the clever & entirely private courtyard, this is a fantastic entertaining space, with built in timber seating. The Kitchen complements the home featuring stone benches, stainless steel appliances and its own outlook over the courtyard. Offering comfort with ducted gas heating & ducted evaporative cooling. You will be warmly welcomed in this period home, with instant appeal in a popular address.

Description:
EXECUTIVE LIVING
This 12 year old executive home has been built to excepting standards. The home consists of 4 bedrooms the main featuring en suite and walk in robes. The remaining 3 bedrooms all have built in robes. The formal lounge features a bay window which overlooks the peaceful terraced front yard. The much larger than normal meals family room area is a mix of both carpeted and tiled floors, which overlooks an open plan kitchen with solid timber cabinetry, walk in pantry, dishwasher, gas hotplates and electric oven. The stainless steel sink is under a large window which oversee the secluded terraced back yard with views of the state forest and many nature trails.

Description:
KENNINGTONS GOLDEN OPPORTUNITY
Location, Location! This highly sought after precinct is rarely offered.
Positioned opposite the well renowned “St. Therese's Primary School”, and only a stone's throw to shops, University & the CBD. This is a classic cream brick three bedroom home, on an allotment of approx. 620 sqm. The home has traditional 60's features with high ceilings, wide hallway, & will need some cosmetic TLC! The lounge & meals are positioned towards the front of the home, and offers great space. Each bedroom is sizeable especially the master which has four built in robes. With a large family bathroom, and additional storage in the hallway, plus a second toilet! At the back section of the home you have a huge rumpus / kid's zone / second living area, with access to the third bedroom.
From the back verandah you will appreciate the elevation, overlooking the yard you can canvas your future garden plans, and take advantage of the off street parking. Also including (5 X 6m) shed,
(5 X 6m) workshop & (5 X 5 m) storage shed. Not only is this your chance to buy in one of Bendigo's best suburbs, but a huge opportunity to develop & greatly improve the home in a dream location. Anticipated Price Range $275,000 - $300,000

Description:
REMODELLED CLASSICAL CONTEMPORARY STYLE WITH DELIGHTFUL GARDEN
"Eden House" was built on the pick of the blocks in The Strand, boasting lovely elevated views from the front, giving you a feeling of peace and serenity. Tucked away off Yallambee Drive, this home has been remodelled with grace and style. Offering a chic black and white tiled entry of generous proportions, leading to both formal dining room and formal lounge room with marble mantel showcasing a gas log fire. Centrally located is the elegant kitchen with an enormous amount of storeage and vast bench spaces, this area adjoins the family room with a built in window seat, more garden views and a sliding door directly to the paved area, with feature water fountain. My favorite room is the sundrenched breakfast room/reading room which has French doors opening to the rear courtyard. There are 3 bedrooms and a home office/library or 4th bedroom. The master suite has direct access to a private garden nook, plenty of built in robes and an exquisitely updated ensuite. The second bathroom has also been exquisitely updated. Overall this home has been remodelled for the taste and layout of the discerning empty nesters.
Insights: 11 The Strand, Kennington VIC 3550 was last sold in 2014 and 26 other 4 bedroom house in Kennington have recently been sold.

Description:
MAKE IT YOUR OWN
Nestled at the end of a quiet court, in one of Bendigo's most sought after locations, this three-bedroom ranch-style home is perfectly priced for a first-home buyer or investor. There are many reasons why Kennington is so popular with home owners - the proximity to schools and shops, the short hop to the CBD, the safe and leafy streetscapes. The home comprises three large bedrooms, main with ensuite and WIR, formal lounge room with solid-fuel heating, kitchen/meals area with stainless steel appliances, large pantry and gas heating. Evaporative cooling is ducted throughout the home. The rear verandah links, via glass doors, to a huge solid-brick garage. There are also rollers to both the driveway and the backyard so that the whole space can open up to become a versatile undercover entertaining area. When it's not being used for parties, it's the perfect workshop and can also easily accommodate three vehicles. The backyard has both lawn and established gardens, including olive trees laden with fruit. Whether you plan to invest or put your own stamp on this family home, the potential is ripe.

Affordable Living in Classy Precinct
When position and affordability matter, it's hard to look past this cream brick residence which is situated in a tightly held and extremely popular location. Solidly built and offering a practical design including three bedrooms, kitchen/meals area, separate lounge and three piece bathroom. Various heating and cooling options throughout the home ensure year round comfort. Low maintenance 412sqm allotment. This is a fantastic opportunity for buyers to refurbish the home in line with their personal taste and reap the benefits of investing in a location that is renowned for strong growth and lasting popularity.

Description:
When Only The Best Will Do
This impressive, modern property boasts 5 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, 2 powder rooms and a great choice of living areas. There is ducted heating and refrigerated cooling throughout with white timbered window shutters for a tropical feel. There's an elegant formal lounge and dining area, a powder room and laundry. The all white kitchen has Caesar-stone benchtops, stainless steel appliances and a large WIP. An undercover alfresco area will be well used for entertaining, whilst upstairs is restful and roomy. There are 5 bedrooms(4 with BIRs) one with a balcony and another presently used as a sitting room); 2 bathrooms, and a powder room. The main bedroom contains a fabulous walk through wardrobe with lots of shelves and hanging space and a lavish five-piece en suite.Outside you will find beautiful lawns, a rainwater tank and secure fencing on 3 sides. A double garage with a roller door has internal access.

Description:
Kennington Class by the Water
BUILT and finished to a very high standard, this contemporary architect-designed Glenn Loddon family home has idyllic water views, a light, airy and open, split-level layout and so many extras you'll think it's Christmas all year round. The home's north-easterly aspect takes full advantage of the sun. An attractive low-maintenance garden surrounds the home with a dry riverbed a highlight. Polished Tasmanian oak floorboards and stairs add warmth and light to the interior. Subtle Duets' blinds fitted by Needlecraft let the daylight in and give the windows a clean, uncluttered look. Heating and cooling is zoned and via three refrigerated systems. Fitted with stainless steel smeg appliances, great storage, (built-in pantry, easy-glide drawers and much more), the kitchen is a dream. The island bench is finished with a granite overlay, has a breakfast bar, and water views. A meals area is adjacent and overlooks a large family room on the next level. Sliding doors open to a fabulous decked entertaining area, again with water views, and featuring a stylish leaf wall sculpture. Timber stairs lead to the main bedroom with its walk-in wardrobe, three-piece en suite and front row' balcony views. The owner has taken photos of the sunrise across Kennington Reservoir from his bed. At the far end of the home two more bedrooms, both with mirrored built-in wardrobes share a very large three-piece bathroom with spa bath. Ample laundry storage includes an in-built ironing board. The double garage has shelving, auto roller door plus the benefit of enough space at the entrance for a third vehicle. Other features include tinted windows, a ducted vacuum system, Crimsafe-style security doors, insulation, a gas assisted solar panel hot-water service and two rainwater tanks. Surround sound enhances television viewing and is wired to the deck and lounge room. Schools, shops, the uni, sportsfields and tennis courts are only minutes away. The extras are too numerous to mention so call the agent. He'll show you everything and prepare to be impressed.
